abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: (a) upgrading
            7.6 miles East-West Transport Corridor and constructing and
            improving about 2.6 miles of local roads; (b) strengthening
            60 miles of paved rural roads; (c) consulting services for
            detailed engineering and construction supervision; (d)
            technical assistance to Ministry of Works (Highways
            Division) for highway planning, pavement design and contract
            administration and to assist the Borrower in strengthening
            the domestic construction industry.
